input_text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
2LUV Plus Women's Stripe Knit Sheer Back Plus Size Top

Product specifications:
66% POLYESTER 30% RAYON 4% SPANDEX CONTRAST 100% POLYESTER
This top features a scoop neckline with short sleeves, stripe front complete with a back sheer material.
Made In USA
true to size

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Feel effortlessly chic in this gorgeous top! The sheer material is perfectly matched with the bold stripes, creating a look that is both classic and modern. The scoop neckline gives a hint of sexy, while the short sleeves add a touch of sophistication. The back of the top is sheer, revealing just a little bit of skin, which will keep you cool and comfortable on hot summer days. Made in the USA, this top is true to size and will be the perfect addition to your wardrobe.
input_text.Response B: Look great and feel comfortable in this Plus Size Top by 2LUV. A flattering scoop neckline enhances this stylish short sleeved top. Providing all day comfort, this knit top features a fun striped pattern on the front and a flirty sheer back. Try it with a pair of your favorite jeans and ankle booties, or dress it up with a skirt and heels.
